text: C. Kathiravan assumed office as the 8th Collector of Krishnagiri on Friday. Formerly the Commissioner of Madurai Corporation, Mr. Kathiravan began his stint with the Revenue department and had worked as Sub Collector (Training) in Dharmapuri district in 2002. Mr. Kathiravan replaces T.P. Rajesh, who was transferred as the Collector of Karur.
title: New Collector takes charge
